description: Installing traffic calming measures could jeopardise stages in Castletown, rally organisers say.
title: Speed bump threat to Isle of Man rally stages in Castletown
title_page: Speed bump threat to Isle of Man rally stages in Castletown - BBC News
maintext: "Cars can't be expected to ride over these humps, which in some cases are quite substantial, and not do damage to the cars. In which case then we wouldn't be able to run the stage," he said.
